channel.title: Cheat in a maths test
channel.description:
well in year 8 we normally sit on either ends of the table to do our maths tests. for most of them calculators are allowed. so what me and my friend do is pretend we only have one calculator between us. so the teacher lets us share. then on the calculator we press the button : Ans
im not sure if all of you have this in your calculators but you'll be able to figure something out. then we press the number of the question we want the answer to for example:
Ans 8 and then my friend types in 1, 2 , 3 or 4 if its a mulitple choice 1=a 2=b 3=c 4=e other wise he just types in the answer for example: 62 and passes the calculator to me.
i know this isnt the best technique but we have never been caught and i works for us :D

item.title: Cheat in a maths test
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

sanga282:

y do u even need 2 cheat in maths test they sooooooooooooooo easy

Thats because you are still learning “x+3=5”
try AP Calculus?
AP Statistics.

I’m going into stats next year. It’s going to be pretty hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat in a maths test
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote="† Nirvana †, post:12, topic:113089"][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=161703.msg1525808#msg1525808 date=1182382708]
I did this on my Finals with my friends… We just checked after it…

Got a B :D!
[/quote]

I study and get A’s dont rely on your dumb friend k?[/quote]

I didn’t study at all and my “dumb friends” who studied got A’s :O…

We didn’t cheat we checked it over after the finals…

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat in a maths test
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:10, topic:113089”]I have my math final tomorrow, and already have all the answers to both form A and form B

My friend who has the same class 2nd period got the Form A, and his friend got B. They programmed the answers into their graphing calculators, for mass distribution :P[/quote]
that is rather awesome.

and goatee i know they could make one now… i just believe in the future there will be a black market sort of thing for items like the one i described.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat in a maths test
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

davidude36:

I believe you could set up a calculator or something that looks like a calculator to connect to the internet somehow (in the near future) this would be great to cheat on by connecting to google and checking the question…although the teachers will find out sooner or later.

In the near future? No body is going to make a device for cheating in tests. Anyways they could do that now, get a slimline phone and make it look like a calculator.

Read full topic
